module: The `eth_transmitcontrol` module manages Ethernet frame transmission, focusing on generating pause frames under specific network conditions. It processes input signals like transmission requests and network condition indicators to dynamically manage flow control and frame initialization or termination. Utilizing internal counters and state machines, the module controls timing for CRC calculations and handles data stream adjustments, deciding when to start or end transmissions based on the presence of control data like MAC address and pause time values, ensuring synchronized and condition-responsive Ethernet communication.
